directions: Heat a large pan over medium-high heat. Saute onion in sesame oil until softened, about 5 minutes. Add ginger; cook and stir until softened. Stir in chickpeas, peas, and tamari until combined and heated through. Add bok choy; stir until wilted, 3 to 5 minutes.
title: Warm Vegan Chickpea Salad
